extensionDescription.message: Start your day feeling calm by just breathing in and out
extensionDescription.decription: Decription which appears on the extension details page

defaultTitle.description: Title displayed when you hover over the extension icon in the toolbar

defaultControlBtnText.description: Default text displayed on control button

breathInText.description: Text displayed on control button when breathing in

breathOutText.description: Text displayed on control button when breathing out

reportBugAnchorText.description: Anchor text for report bug link at the bottom of the popup

aboutBreathingMenuText.description: Text for about link on the dropdown menu

openSettingsMenuText.description: Text for open settings link on the dropdown menu

openMenuTitleText.description: Title text for the menu control button when dropdown menu is closed

closeMenuTitleText.description: Title text for the menu control button when dropdown menu is open

openMenuAriaLabel.description: Aria label for menu control button when dropdown menu is closed

closeMenuAriaLabel.description: Aria label for menu control button when dropdown menu is open

toggleDarkThemeTitleText.description: Title text for the theme control button when light theme is selected

toggleLightThemeTitleText.description: Title text for the theme control button when dark theme is selected

toggleDarkThemeAriaLabel.description: Aria label for the theme control button when light theme is selected

toggleLightThemeAriaLabel.description: Aria label for the theme control button when dark theme is selected

closePopupTitleText.description: Title text which appears when you hover over close popup button

closePopupAriaLabel.description: Aria label for the close popup button

breathingCountLabelText.description: Label text for the number input element on the options page

saveSettingsButtonText.description: Text for save settings button on the options page

successMessage.description: Text for message which briefly pops up when user successfully updates breathing count
